text: Cuz in nest, ki [Alloh taolo] faqat murdor va xun va gusti xuk va on ciro, ki [hangomi zaʙh] nomi ƣajri Alloh taolo ʙar on ʙurda sudaast, ʙar sumo harom kardaast; pas, har ki [ʙaroi hifzi conas ʙa xurdani onho] nocor savad [va] sarkasu zijodaxoh naʙosad, [ʙar u gunoh nest, caro ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast
